import React from 'react' import { Menu, Icon, Search, Button, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Login from './components/Login' import Logout from './components/Logout' import Signup from './components/Signup' import { changeSearchText } from './actions/searchbar' import './images/userIcon.png'; const NavBar = ({loggedIn, searchText}) => { return (
changeSearchText(e.target.value)} /> {loggedIn ? : Login } closeIcon> Signup } closeIcon> }
) } const mapStateToProps = ({currentUser, searchbar})=> { return { currentUser, loggedIn: !!currentUser, searchText: searchbar } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {onChange: changeSearchText})(NavBar);
